body: This PR adds functionality for clients to send DHT getnodes requests to their DHT peers, as well as to see nodes sent to them from their peers in getnodes response packets. A typical use case would be for a DHT network crawler, but it could also be used for understanding and diagnosing DHT network behaviour. --- This change is‚ÄÇ[](https://reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/1935)

comment_data.body: What doesn't tokstyle like about this and the next function?
comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -37,6 +39,125 @@ void tox_callback_friend_lossless_packet_per_pktid(Tox *tox, tox_friend_lossless
 void tox_set_av_object(Tox *tox, void *object);
 void *tox_get_av_object(const Tox *tox);
 
+
+/*******************************************************************************
+ *
+ * :: DHT network queries.
+ *
+ ******************************************************************************/
+
+
+
+typedef struct Tox_Dht_Node {
+    void *data;
+} Tox_Dht_Node;
+
+/**
+ * The minimum size of an IP string buffer in bytes.
+ */
+#define TOX_DHT_NODE_IP_STRING_SIZE      96
+
+//!TOKSTYLE-
+uint32_t tox_dht_node_ip_string_size(void);

comment_data.body: It doesn't like the lack of respective function definitions in tox.c. I don't know why it doesn't complain about the ones in tox.h.
comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -37,6 +39,125 @@ void tox_callback_friend_lossless_packet_per_pktid(Tox *tox, tox_friend_lossless
 void tox_set_av_object(Tox *tox, void *object);
 void *tox_get_av_object(const Tox *tox);
 
+
+/*******************************************************************************
+ *
+ * :: DHT network queries.
+ *
+ ******************************************************************************/
+
+
+
+typedef struct Tox_Dht_Node {
+    void *data;
+} Tox_Dht_Node;
+
+/**
+ * The minimum size of an IP string buffer in bytes.
+ */
+#define TOX_DHT_NODE_IP_STRING_SIZE      96
+
+//!TOKSTYLE-
+uint32_t tox_dht_node_ip_string_size(void);

commit.message:
Add DHT queries to private API

This commit adds functionality for clients to interact with
the DHT, sending getnodes requests to their peers and receiving
nodes in getnodes responses.

verification.payload:

parent e58ee064921442fd9d93ba435a4865e8328d3596
author jfreegman <jfreegman@gmail.com> 1643648605 -0500
committer jfreegman <jfreegman@gmail.com> 1644507211 -0500

Add DHT queries to private API

This commit adds functionality for clients to interact with
the DHT, sending getnodes requests to their peers and receiving
nodes in getnodes responses.

commit.message:
Add autotest for dht getnodes API

The test creates a small DHT and makes sure that each
peer is able to crawl the full network

Add autotest for dht getnodes API

The test creates a small DHT and makes sure that each
peer is able to crawl the full network
